param.name: compat_mode
param.label: Compatibility Mode
param.description: If you experience problems with files downloading, try using this mode.

param.name: drop_tables
param.label: Drop Tables on Uninstall
param.description: Drop com_biblestudy database tables on uninstall? Default does NOT drop tables.

param.name: admin_store
param.label: Show Store in Study Entry Screen
param.description: Show or Hide store on studielist edit form.

param.name: studylistlimit
param.label: Study Limit in MediaFile
param.description: Limit for number of studies to show in MediaFile Record drop down on admin side - leave blank for all

param.name: location_id
param.label: Choose a Location
param.description: Choose a default location to display in the form.

param.name: teacher_id
param.label: Choose a Teacher
param.description: Choose a default teacher to display in the form

param.name: series_id
param.label: Series
param.description: Choose a series to display as default

param.name: booknumber
param.label: Book
param.description: Choose a Book to display as default

param.name: topic_id
param.label: Topic
param.description: Choose a topic to display as default

param.name: messagetype
param.label: Message Type
param.description: Choose a message type to display as default

param.name: series_imagefolder
param.label: Series Thumbnail Folder
param.description: Path from images folder to series images like /images/series. If left blank then /images/stories is assumed.

param.name: media_imagefolder
param.label: Media Image Folder
param.description: Path from images folder to media images like /images/media. If left blank then /components/com_biblestudy/images is assumed.

param.name: teachers_imagefolder
param.label: Teacher Image Folder
param.description: Path from images folder to teacher images like /images/teachers. If left blank then /images/stories is assumed.

param.name: study_images
param.label: Study Thumbnails Image Folder
param.description: Path from images folder to study thumbnail images like /images/thumbnails. If left blank then /images/stories is assumed.

param.name: podcast_imagefolder
param.label: Podcast Image Folder
param.description: Path from images folder to podcast images like /images/podcast. If left blank then /images/stories is assumed.

param.name: avr
param.label: Default Use All Videos Reloaded
param.description: Set to Yes if you wish all mediafile records to automatically have Use AVR selected.

param.name: download
param.label: Default Show Download Button
param.description: Set to Yes if you wish all mediafile records to automatically have the Show Download button selected.

param.name: target
param.label: Default target type
param.description: Set to a particular target type as default.

param.name: server
param.label: Default Server
param.description: Choose a default server from your list.

param.name: path
param.label: Default Folder
param.description: Choose a default folder from your list.

param.name: podcast
param.label: Default Podcast
param.description: Choose a default podcast from your list.

param.name: mime
param.label: Default Mime Type
param.description: Choose a default mime type from your list.
